4. Deputy Mayor Pro Tem & District 5 Council Member Andrew Evans

Deputy Mayor Pro Tem & District 5 Council Member Andrew Evans
=============================================================

Andrew has been a proud resident of Little Elm for several years and is a dedicated Christian and father to his daughter and son.

In addition to serving his constituents, Andrew is a senior operations consultant in the mortgage servicing industry. He excels at data analysis, organization, and creating high-level reports for business leaders. His main focus is to enhance Little Elm's future by attracting jobs, entertainment, dining, and recreational opportunities while addressing the town's geographical and commuting challenges to bring the community closer together.

After moving from California to escape its political climate, Andrew has actively participated in the Townâ€™s Citizen Academies and has emerged as a community leader.

Andrew enjoys being a father, running, participating in physical agility races, golfing, dining out, and attending community festivals. He loves Little Elm for its strong sense of community, small-town charm, safety, and family-friendly, affordable activities and events.
